document_data.name: Weapon Bless
document_data.mainbody: '''''Weapon bless''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[shugenja]] in [[Kara-Tur]]. The spell was very rare outside Kara-Tur.
document_data.Effects: A shugenja used this spell to bless a [[weapon]] against a particular creature. The target creature had to be clearly identified and precise, by either name or location. The weapon can be used to strike creatures who had immunity to non-magical weapons. But if the weapons is used against any other creature then the targeted individual, the spell was broken.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required [[material component]]s, [[ink]] made from the blood of a [[dragon]] and a brush. During casting, the shugenja used these items to write the blessings on the weapon.
